plot: Homer and Mr. Burns get trapped in a snowed-in cabin during a company retreat.

Burns takes his staff to Mount Useful for a team-building exercise,the object being to reach a cabin at the top. Paired with Homer,Burns cheats and they reach their destination but experience cabin fever when snowed in by an avalanche. Eventually Homer uses a propane stove to turn the cabin into a sled that sends them back to safety.—don @ minifie-1
